Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: பீலிபெய் சாகாடும் அச்சிறும் அப்பண்டஞ் சால மிகுத்துப் பெயின்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: The axle tree of a bandy, loaded only with peacocks' feathers will break, if it be greatly overloaded.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A large, sturdy cart ('சாகாடு') is being loaded with peacock feathers ('பீலி'). The feathers are individually light and beautiful.
Layered_Composition.Midground: However, the loading is excessive. A mountain-sized pile of feathers is being heaped onto the cart, far beyond its capacity ('சால மிகுத்துப் பெயின்').
Layered_Composition.Background: Under the immense, accumulated weight of the feathers, the strong axle of the cart ('அச்சு') is shown dramatically snapping in two, causing the entire cart to collapse.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: A powerful visual lesson on limits: even the lightest of things, when accumulated in excessive quantity, can break the strongest support.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The contrast between the lightness of a single feather and the immense, destructive weight of the pile is the core concept. The snapping axle is the dramatic climax, proving the point.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Dramatic, surprising, cautionary, a lesson in physics and metaphor.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: Bright, vibrant colors for the peacock feathers to emphasize their individual beauty and seeming harmlessness. The lighting should be dramatic at the moment the axle snaps.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A low-angle shot, looking up at the massive pile of feathers, emphasizing its overwhelming scale just before the axle breaks.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, with detailed textures on the wood of the cart and the feathers. Slow-motion effect for the breaking axle.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Clear, natural light that turns dramatic as the structure fails.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: Hyperrealism, with a focus on dramatic tension.
